Title: Mud Bowl
Plot: A chemical spill near Dillon High School forces Coach Taylor and the Panthers to seek another facility in which to play the crucial State Semi-Final game.
GuestStars: Amber Middlebrook, Phillip Ontiveros Senior, Ed Clements, Brian Ernest, Odell Grant, Seth Spiker, John William Athas, Charles Sanders, Richard Jackson, Tom Procida, Mark Walters, Peter Malof, Todd Whitthorne, Mic
